lwc-accordion.description: Accordion - A collection of vertically stacked sections with multiple content areas.

lwc-accordion-section.description: Accordion Section - Creates a lightning-accordion-section tag

lwc-avatar.description: Avatar - A visual representation of an object.

body: icon-alternative-text="${3:The alternative text which is displayed as tooltip text.}"
lwc-badge.description: Badge - Represents a label which holds a small amount of information, such as the number of unread notifications.

lwc-barcode-scanner.description: Barcode Scanner - The lightning-barcode-scanner component embeds a barcode scanning function displayed as an icon, which launches the barcode scanner when the user clicks it.

lwc-breadcrumb-link.description: Breadcrumb (element) w/ link navigation - Displays the individual page path relative to a parent page

lwc-breadcrumb-onclick.description: Breadcrumb (element) w/ onClick handler - Displays the individual page path relative to a parent page

lwc-breadcrumbs-for-each-loop.description: Breadcrumbs w/ for each loop - Displays the path of a page relative to a parent page.

lwc-breadcrumbs-link.description: Breadcrumbs w/ link navigation - Displays the path of a page relative to a parent page.

lwc-breadcrumbs-onclick.description: Breadcrumbs w/ onclick handler - Displays the path of a page relative to a parent page.

lwc-button.description: Button - A clickable element used to perform an action.

lwc-button-advanced.description: Button Advanced - A clickable element used to perform an action.

lwc-button-group.description: Button Group - Represents a set of buttons that can be displayed together to create a navigational bar.

lwc-button-group-dropdown-menu.description: Button Group w/ Dropdown Menu - Represents a set of buttons that can be displayed together to create a navigational bar.

lwc-button-icon.description: Button Icon - An icon-only HTML button.

lwc-button-icon-stateful.description: Button Icon Stateful - represents an icon-only button element that toggles between two states.

lwc-button-menu.description: Button Menu - represents a dropdown menu with a list of actions or functions.

lwc-button-stateful.description: Button Stateful - A button that toggles between states.

lwc-card.description: Card - Cards apply a container around a related grouping of information.

lwc-carousel.description: Carousel - A collection of images that are displayed one at a time.

lwc-carousel-image.description: Carousel Image - Specifies an image used in lighting-carousel, including description and title.

body: message-when-value-missing="${5:Optional message to be displayed when no checkbox is selected and the required attribute is set.}"
lwc-checkbox-group.description: Checkbox Group - A checkbox group that enables a selection of single or multiple options.

lwc-click-to-dial.description: Click To Dial - Renders a formatted phone number as click-to-dial enabled or disabled for Open CTI and Voice.

lwc-combobox.description: Combobox - A widget that provides an input field that is readonly, accompanied by a dropdown list of selectable options.

body: field-level-help="${1:Help text detailing the purpose and function of the combobox.}"
message-when-value-missing="${3:Optional message to be displayed when no checkbox is selected and the required attribute is set.}"
lwc-combobox-advanced.description: Combobox Advanced - All attributes. A widget that provides an input field that is readonly, accompanied by a dropdown list of selectable options.

lwc-datatable.description: Datatable - A table that displays rows and columns of data

lwc-datatable-advanced.description: Datatable Advanced - All attributes, a table that displays rows and columns of data

lwc-dual-listbox.description: Dual Listbox - A pair of listboxes that enables multiple options to be selected and reordered.

lwc-dual-listbox-default-values.description: Dual Listbox with default values - Dual Listbox utilizing minimum and maximum number of selections attributes. A pair of listboxes that enables multiple options to be selected and reordered.

lwc-dual-listbox-min-max.description: Dual Listbox Min Max - Dual Listbox utilizing minimum and maximum number of selections attributes. A pair of listboxes that enables multiple options to be selected and reordered.

lwc-dual-listbox-required-options.description: Dual Listbox with Required Options - Dual Listbox utilizing minimum and maximum number of selections attributes. A pair of listboxes that enables multiple options to be selected and reordered.

body: alternative-text="${2:Text that describes what is happening not what the icon looks like.}"
lwc-dynamic-icon.description: Dynamic Icon - Represents various animated icons with different states.

body: alternative-text="${1:Text that describes what is happening not what the icon looks like.}"
lwc-dynamic-icon-ellie.description: Dynamic Icon Ellie - Show a pulsing blue circle, which pulses and stops after one animation cycle. This icon is great for field calculations or a process that's running in the background.

body: alternative-text="${1:Text that describes what is happening not what the icon looks like.}"
lwc-dynamic-icon-eq.description: Dynamic Icon EQ - Show an animated graph with three bars that rise and fall randomly. This icon is great for a graph that's refreshing.

body: alternative-text="${1:Text that describes what is happening not what the icon looks like.}"
lwc-dynamic-icon-score.description: Dynamic Icon Score - Show a green filled circle or a red unfilled circle. This icon is great for showing positive and negative indicators.

body: alternative-text="${1:Text that describes what is happening not what the icon looks like.}"
lwc-dynamic-icon-strength.description: Dynamic Icon Strength - Show three animated horizontal circles that are colored green or red. This icon is great for Einstein calculations or indicating password strengths.

body: alternative-text="${1:Text that describes what is happening not what the icon looks like.}"
lwc-dynamic-icon-trend.description: Dynamic Icon Trend - Show animated arrows that point up, down, or straight. This icon is great for showing movement of a value from one range to another, like a forecast score.

body: alternative-text="${1:Text that describes what is happening not what the icon looks like.}"
lwc-dynamic-icon-waffle.description: Dynamic Icon Waffle - Show a square made up of a 3x3 grid of circles. This icon animates on hover. This icon is great for app-related items, like the App Launcher in Lightning Experience.

lwc-file-upload.description: File Upload - provides an easy and integrated way for users to upload multiple files.

lwc-formatted-address.description: Formatted Address - Displays a formatted address with a link to the given location on Google Maps. The link is opened in a new tab. A static map can be displayed with the address for better context.

lwc-formatted-address-extended.description: Formatted Address Extended - All attributes. Displays a formatted address with a link to the given location on Google Maps. The link is opened in a new tab. A static map can be displayed with the address for better context.

lwc-formatted-address-lat-long.description: Formatted Address w/ Lat/Long - Using latitude and longitude coordinates for faster map rendering. Displays a formatted address with a link to the given location on Google Maps. The link is opened in a new tab. A static map can be displayed with the address for better context.

lwc-formatted-address-locale.description: Formatted Address Locale - Displays an address in the format of a specific locale.

lwc-formatted-date-time.description: Formatted Date Time - Displays formatted date and time

lwc-formatted-email.description: Formatted Email - Displays an email as a hyperlink with the mailto: URL scheme.

lwc-formatted-email-onclick.description: Formatted Email OnClick- Displays an email as a hyperlink with a custom click hander.

lwc-formatted-location.description: Formatted Location - Displays a geolocation in decimal degrees using the format [latitude, longitude].

formatted-name.description: Formatted Name - Displays a formatted name that can include a salutation and suffix.

lwc-formatted-number-currency.description: Formatted Number Currency - Displays formatted numbers as currency values

lwc-formatted-number-decimal.description: Formatted Number Decimal - Displays formatted numbers in decimals format.

lwc-formatted-number-percentage.description: Formatted Number Percentage - Displays a number in percentage format.

lwc-formatted-phone.description: Formatted Phone - Displays a phone number as a hyperlink with the tel: URL scheme.

lwc-formatted-rich-text.description: Formatted Rich Text - Displays rich text that's formatted with allowed tags and attributes. Other tags and attributes are removed and only their text content is displayed.

lwc-formatted-text.description: Formatted Text - Displays text, replaces newlines with line breaks, and linkifies if requested.

lwc-formatted-time.description: Formatted Time - Displays a formatted time in user's locale format.

lwc-formatted-url.description: Formatted URL - Displays a URL as a hyperlink.

lwc-helptext.description: Helptext - An icon with a text popover used for tooltips.

lwc-icon.description: Icon - Represents a visual element that provides context and enhances usability.

lwc-input.description: Input - Represents interactive controls that accept user input depending on the type attribute.

lwc-input-address.description: Input Address - Address fields can be pre-populated and marked as required.

lwc-input-address-state-country-picklist.description: Input Address - Address fields support predefined lists of states and countries.

lwc-input-advanced.description: Input (advanced) - Input element that includes onfocus and onblur attributes to enable custom behavior on the element.

lwc-input-checkbox.description: Input Checkbox - Checkbox options can be required or disabled

lwc-input-checkbox-button.description: Input Checkbox Button - Checkbox buttons can be required or disabled

lwc-input-color.description: Input Color - Color input fields provide a color swatch for entering a HEX or RGB value.

lwc-input-date.description: Input Date - Date input fields provide a date picker for entering a date.

body: label="${2:Date field with a predefined value}"

lwc-input-date-time.description: Input Date Time - Date/Time input fields provide a date and time picker for entering a date and time.

lwc-input-email.description: Input Email - Email input fields are for entering email addresses.

lwc-input-email-advanced.description: Input Email Advanced - Includes attributes to accept multiple addresses, pre-define values, disabled, and read-only

lwc-input-field.description: Input Field - To be used within lightning-record-edit-form components. Represents an editable input for a field on a Salesforce object.

lwc-input-file.description: Input File - File input fields support upload of single or multiple files and can restrict the accepted types

lwc-input-location.description: Input Location - Geolocation fields include a latitude and longitude field

lwc-input-name.description: Input Field - A name compound field displaying Salutation, First Name, and Last Name fields by default.

lwc-input-name-advanced.description: Input Field - A name compound field displaying Salutation, First Name, and Last Name fields by default.

lwc-input-number.description: Input Number - Number input fields support decimal, percentage, and currency values.

lwc-input-password.description: Input Password - Password input fields obscure your text input.

lwc-input-rich-text.description: Input Rich Text - A WYSIWYG editor with a customizable toolbar for entering rich text.

lwc-input-rich-text-advanced.description: Input Rich Text - A WYSIWYG editor with a customizable toolbar for entering rich text.

body: label="${3:Search when user hits the 'enter' key}"
lwc-input-search.description: Input Search - Search input fields enable search queries.

lwc-input-telephone.description: Input Telephone - Input fields that support number pattern matching

lwc-input-time-basic.description: Input Time - Time input fields provide a dropdown list of time values in 15-minute increments.

body: label="${2:Time field with min and max values}"
lwc-input-time-advanced.description: Input Time - Time input fields support earliest and latest time input.

lwc-input-toggle.description: Input Toggle - Toggle buttons can be required or disabled

lwc-input-url.description: Input URL - URL input fields support URL pattern matching.

lwc-layout.description: Layout - A layout can include layout items as columns

lwc-layout-item.description: Layout Item - Layout items take the size of their content by default

lwc-layout-item-advanced.description: Layout Item - Layout items take the size of their content by default

lwc-map.description: Map - Displays a map of one or more locations.

lwc-menu-divider.description: Menu Divider - Creates a divider in the list of items for lightning-button-menu.

lwc-menu-item.description: Menu Item - Represents a list in a menu.

lwc-menu-item-for-each.description: Menu Item - Used a for:each loop to generate menu items.

lwc-menu-subheader.description: Menu Subheader - Creates a subheader in the list of items in lightning-button-menu.

body: <!-- this should be incapsulated in its own component, see https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/component-library/bundle/lightning-modal/documentation -->
lwc-modal.description: Modal - Extend this component to create a message modal overlayed on the current app window.

lwc-modal-body.description: Modal Body - Displays main content area in a lightning modal

lwc-modal-footer.description: Modal Footer - Displays footer content in a lightning modal

lwc-modal-header.description: Modal Header - Displays heading and tagline at the top of a modal

lwc-output-field.description: Output Field - Represents a read-only display of a label, help text, and value for a field on a Salesforce object.

lwc-record-picker.description: Record Picker - Allows you to search for a list of Salesforce Records that match search input

lwc-pill-avatar.description: Pill w/ Avatar - A pill element containing an avatar

lwc-pill-container.description: Pill Container - A list of pills grouped in a container. This component requires API version 42.0 and later.

lwc-pill-error.description: Pill Error - A pill indicates an error condition by specifying the has-error attribute.

lwc-pill-icon.description: Pill w/ Icon - A pill element containing an icon

lwc-pill-link.description: Pill Link - A pill displays a label that can contain links and be removed from view.

lwc-pill-remove-handler.description: Pill w/ Remove Handler - A pill displays a label that can contain links and be removed from view.

lwc-progress-bar.description: Progress Bar - Displays a horizontal progress bar from left to right to indicate the progress of an operation.

lwc-progress-indicator.description: Progress Indicator - Provides a visual indication on the progress of a particular process.

lwc-progress-indicator-iteration.description: Progress Indicator w/ Iteration - Provides a visual indication on the progress of a particular process.

lwc-progress-ring.description: Progress Ring - Displays a circular progress indicator to provide feedback about an action or process. This component requires API version 48.0 and later.

lwc-progress-step.description: Progress Step - Defines a step in the lightning-progress-indicator.

lwc-quick-action-panel.description: Quick Action Panel - Build your own action modals that use the Salesforce Lightning Design System (SLDS) modal styling.

lwc-radio-group.description: Radio Group - A radio button group that can have a single option selected.

lwc-radio-group-advanced.description: Radio Group Advanced- A radio button group that can have a single option selected.

lwc-record-edit-form.description: Record Edit Form - Represents a record edit layout that displays one or more fields, provided by lightning-input-field.

lwc-record-form.description: Record Form - Creates an editable form or display form for a record.

lwc-record-view-form.description: Record View Form - Represents a record view layout that displays one or more fields, provided by lightning-output-field.

lwc-relative-date-time.description: Relative Date Time - Displays the relative time difference between the source date-time and the provided date-time.

lwc-rich-text-toolbar-button.description: Rich Text Toolbar Button - A custom button on the lightning-input-rich-text toolbar.

lwc-rich-text-toolbar-button-group.description: Rich Text Toolbar Button Group - Creates a custom button group in lightning-input-rich-text.

lwc-service-cloud-voice-toolkit-api.description: Service Cloud Voice Toolkit API - A collection of front-end event listeners and API methods for interacting with Service Cloud Voice. This component requires API version 52.0 and later.

lwc-slider.description: Slider - An input range slider for specifying a value between two specified numbers.

lwc-spinner-conditional.description: Spinner w/ Conditional- Displays an animated spinner

lwc-tab.description: Tab - A single tab in a tabset component.

lwc-tab-advanced.description: Tab - A single tab in a tabset component.

lwc-tabset.description: Tabset - Represents a list of tabs

lwc-tabset-iteration.description: Tabset Iterative - Represents a list of tabs

lwc-textarea.description: Textarea - Represents a multiline text input field.

lwc-tile.description: Tile - A grouping of related information associated with a record.

lwc-tile-avatar.description: Tile Avatar - A grouping of related information associated with a record.

lwc-tile-icon.description: Tile Icon - A grouping of related information associated with a record.

lwc-tree-grid.description: Tree Grid - Displays a hierarchical view of data in a table.

lwc-vertical-navigation.description: Vertical Navigation - A vertical list of links that either take the user to another page or parts of the page the user is in.

lwc-vertical-navigation-item.description: Vertical Navigation Item - A text-only link within lightning-vertical-navigation-section or lightning-vertical-navigation-overflow.

body: assistive-text="${1:text describing the count and purpose of the badge}"
lwc-vertical-navigation-item-badge.description: Vertical Navigation Item Badge - A link and badge within lightning-vertical-navigation-section or lightning-vertical-navigation-overflow.

lwc-vertical-navigation-item-icon.description: Vertical Navigation Item Icon - A link and icon within lightning-vertical-navigation-section or lightning-vertical-navigation-overflow.

lwc-vertical-navigation-overflow.description: Vertical Navigation Overflow - Creates an expandable section of vertical navigation items.

lwc-vertical-navigation-section.description: Vertical Navigation Section - provides a heading which has vertical navigation items nested underneath
